DOC.brief_summary: A UK prospective, single-centre feasibility study investigating the effects of exercise therapy on functional capacity in patients on the waiting list for liver transplantation. Patients will receive a 12-week home prehabilitation program (daily step program; functional resistance exercise sessions; telephone health call or virtual clinic). The following will be assessed at weeks 0, 6 and 12 weeks: feasibility (recruitment, compliance, safety, patients perception), functional capacity (ISWT, SPBT), psychological wellbeing (HADS questionnaire) and quality of life (EQ-5D)
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Exercise Therapy on Functional Capacity in Patients Listed for Liver Transplantation
